snippet: Staff Sgt. Robert Bales, the  figure at the center of the worst American war crime in recent memory, admitted for the first time deliberately killing 16 Afghan civilians, most of them women and children.
abstract: Staff Sgt Robert Bales admits for first time to deliberately killing 16 Afghan civilians, most of them women and children, in worst American war crime in recent memory; guilty plea removes possibility of death penalty in the case.
